name: preatomic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
happening or existing in the time before the atomic bomb (= a bomb that uses the energy that is created when atoms are divided) was invented : She was born on what turned out to be the world's last preatomic day. Human history can be divided into two distinct phases, preatomic and postatomic. The war was of the pre-atomic type and not the kind that may be expected in a future conflict.
More examplesFewer examplesHe advised them that defence policies in pre-atomic bomb terms were now useless.
